alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Greeley County through 500 PM MDT... At 429 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Horace, or 7 miles southwest of Tribune, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tribune and Horace around 445 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for west central Kansas.
